title: Destroying social fabric, peace & co-existence to win poll is unacceptable: Karnataka BJP MLC Vishwanath - The Indian Express
content:
1. Destroying social fabric, peace & co-existence to win poll is unacceptable: Karnataka BJP MLC Vishwanath  The Indian Express
  2. "Economic Jihad": BJP leader On Halal Meat Business In Karnataka  NDTV
  3. Basavaraj Bommai: Karnataka CM says his govt will look into demand of banning 'halal' meat | Bengaluru News  Times of India
  4. Dissenting voices in Karnataka BJP, Kerala Sangh Parivar could help open up spaces for difficult conversations  The Indian Express
  5. Temple Ban: 2 Karnataka BJP Leaders' Support of Muslim Vendors for Election Win  The Quint

description: Adagur H Vishwanath, who is among two Karnataka BJP legislators to have spoken out against ban on Muslim traders from participating in temple festivals, speaks to The Indian Express on the state's political situation
